Issue.creator: rickr
Issue.summary: Have JIRA report for new issues in rocket chat
Issue.description: When new issues are created in Jira against a component have it report to a specific channel in rocketchat. Ideally I think we only need this for the creation of a new issue. People can then watch the specific Jira if they're interested or not for any following activity. This should keep the noise for this to a minimum.
